title: Peraso anticipates mmWave revenue growth exceeding 2024's full year in Q1 2025

html:
Earnings Call Insights: Peraso Inc. (PRSO) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Ron Glibbery highlighted a 100% year-over-year revenue growth for Q4, driven by the execution of end-of-life memory IC product shipments. He emphasized the company’s focus on expanding its customer base for mmWave
